data.text: @JasonAten I read your column on @Delta lounges. You have it wrong. As a very freq traveler, the lounges are just plain over crowded. Letting us in front of everyone else doesn’t help. Usually end up now finding an empty gate if there is a line.

urls.title: LA Kings Holiday Ice | L.A. LIVE | L.A. LIVE
urls.description: The annual LA Kings Holiday Ice presented by Coca-Cola opens November 26, 2022 - January 8, 2023 at L.A. LIVE! Skate your way into the holiday season. Bring your friends, plan your date night, or enjoy the ice rink before and after a game or concert! General Admission tickets are only available for purchase on-site at the ice rink box office during hours of operation. Please take a look at our frequently asked questions section below for everything you need to know for your visit. Supported by Delta

data.text:
LA Kings Holiday Ice presented by @CocaCola is now open! 

All @Delta SkyMiles Members receive a discount when they show their membership, as well as exclusive access through their own Priority Entrance when pre-purchasing online!

📲 https://t.co/O2rzfWzQuQ https://t.co/kxNUpqdsZu

data.text: @MSharifpourMD @Delta Yuck! I prefer empty flights, but I know that's few and far between as an option these days. I mask, I mask, I mask. We were all confused when MJ wore a mask for years, but now I get why. https://t.co/sZ5lDj8CAm
